name: Number Place HD
description:
Welcome to Number Place!. Play & Practice Sudoku in full 3D in your own Sudoku Temple!.

Number Place has 5 difficulty levels ranging from Very Simple to Expert, offering a challenge for all players.

There is also a full How-To-Play tutorial, and a Sudoku solver.

Can't find the solution for a Sudoku puzzle, simply enter your Sudoku puzzle and let Number Place find a solution for you!

Key Features:

· Interactive 3D board, rotate, zoom, view and play from any angle
· 5 Levels of difficulty:
· Very Simple
· Simple
· Easy
· Intermediate
· Expert
· Simple select peg number and place on board
· Stuck?, then take a hint
· Still stuck?, show the solution
· Record your fastest times for each difficulty level
· Make notes on the board to help you solve the puzzle
· Rotate the board, to see the puzzle from another angle
· Create a puzzle and generate the solution, using the Sudoku Solver!
· Tutorial on how to play
· No Ads or In-App purchases
